name: pr-approval-finder
description: 🔍 Analyze GitHub Pull Requests to determine minimum required approvals based on CODEOWNERS files

scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint:fix" "cd server && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd client && npm run format" "cd server && npm run format"
scripts.format:check: concurrently "cd client && npm run format:check" "cd server && npm run format:check"
scripts.code:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test -- --watchAll=false" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd client && npm run test" "cd server && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd client && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false" "cd server && npm run test -- --coverage"
scripts.pre-commit: npm run sync-version && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.sync-version-manual: node scripts/sync-version.js && echo '\n🔧 Manual sync complete. Run git commit to proceed with your changes.'
